document.full_text: standard & poor's has offered to cap its licensing fees to end an antitrust investigation, eu regulators said on monday, in a move that could help the credit ratings agency avert a possible fine.
document.title: s&p offers to cap license fees to end probe: eu
lines_and_colors: standard & poor's has offered to cap its licensing fees to end an antitrust investigation, eu regulators said on monday, in a move that could help the credit ratings agency avert a possible fine.
